Summary: It was a orange bright color in the sky flying very fast I seen It for about 4 seconds.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was doing my morning run at about 5 am eastern time and looked up and I seen a bright orange light flying out the sky i only seen it for about 4 seconds it was really fast. I had no idea what it was but i knew it was not a plane or any other man made devices.
